commit message: ChatPacketListener: Don't keep a reference to XMPPConnection
ChatPacketListener: Code style cleanup
Move PresencePacketListener from XmppManager to XmppBuddies, where it belongs. There is no need to unregister the Listener since this is done with XMPPConnection.disconnect()
Move XmppBudies logic to XMPPBudies ConnectionChangedListener. Remove the setSubscriptionMode line, since we do this is XmppManager constructor
XmppOfflineMessages: Move iteration from XmppManager to XmppOfflineMessages since offline messages are consumed per defintion and therefore not longer available on subsequent calls.
Don't set PacketListener to null
Raised versionName and versionCode for next release cycle
Update Help command to sort results
Update git configuration
ChackPacketListener: Try to acquire a wakelock when we received a valid XMPP packet
Use Wakelock in LastRecipientRunnable. If the device is in deep sleep a Thread.sleep(long) can take (much) longer then the expected time. The Wakelock should prevent this. Fixes Issue 266
Fix trace
Merge
